definition: to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

pinyin: jing1 ying2 guan3 li3 he2 wei2 hu4

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: Make a "civilized staff", maintain the company profile.
sentences.chinese: 争当文明员工，维护好公司的形象。

sentences.english: The pages to perform the maintenance should be password protected.
sentences.chinese: 执行维护的页面应该有口令保护。

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在扩大对外开放中，要十分注意维护国家经济安全。

sentences.english: Interest group comes from some people's maintenance of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 利益集团来自于部分人对共同利益的维护。

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated .
sentences.chinese: 因此犹太人的圣地不再得到维护，墓园被亵渎。

sentences.english: In this example we maintain only one copy of the data.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，我们仅维护数据的一个副本。

sentences.english: Have knowledge of computer hardware, software, network setting and maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉计算机硬件，软件，开发包网络设计和维护。

sentences.english: Its major problem is that it's been nearly unmaintained for a couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 这个主页的主要问题是已有多年没有维护。

sentences.english: Documenting and defending these decisions depends on the communication skills discussed below.
sentences.chinese: 证明和维护这些决策依赖于下面讨论的交流技能。

sentences.english: The maintenances of the radio sites affect greatly the quality of service of the mobile phone network.
sentences.chinese: 基站维护对提高移动网络的运营质量具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Disadvantages to this approach are apparent in the increased complexity and maintenance effort.
sentences.chinese: 此方法的缺点在于明显地增加了复杂性和维护工作。

sentences.english: Support to set up and maintain MXM Export Compliance system.
sentences.chinese: 协助建立和维护美捷特厦门出口控制系统。

sentences.english: Use a source control system to maintain system configuration files.
sentences.chinese: 使用源代码控制系统维护系统配置文件。

sentences.english: Hu said that China supports Equatorial Guinea's efforts in safeguarding its sovereignty and security.
sentences.chinese: 中方支持赤几维护国家主权和安全的努力。

sentences.english: Consider creating scripts to automate the regular maintenance of queue managers.
sentences.chinese: 考虑创建脚本来自动化队列管理器的定期维护。

definition: to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
